quagga.input.subject:
Re: Project Stanley - Recent Meetings with Alberta Government and
 TransAlta
quagga.input.body:
Rob, I want to keep a relatively low profile until we settle Project 
Stanley.  With respect to cooperating with TransAlta while the lawsuit is 
pending -- that seems to send the wrong signal to TransAlta.

Mark
quagga.input.clean_body:
